name: Spooky Mansion (itch) (Blue Bathtub)
description:
Escape the loop of Spooky Mansion!

A Magician trapped your soul inside  his nearly never ending Mansion. Escape your suffering by solving puzzles. Then your soul will be purified.

WASD - Walk around

E / R - Interact with Objects

Q - Inspect Objects

This game was created for the 47th Game Jam of Ludum Dare with the Theme

Stuck in a loop

Marco Schneider

Philipp Rapp (https://philippr95.artstation.com/)
